api_list.name: getAddressBalance
api_list.description: Get your`s or other`s address balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-api1.p.rapidapi.com/balance/0x00000000219ab540356cBB839Cbe05303d7705Fa"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-api1.p.rapidapi.com/balance/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
